title: Apidonos. The Arch Mage. (Mage Champion Concept)
body:
Apidonos is an Archmage, who excels in magical offensive abilities.
He can be Top, Mid, JG, or Support.






HP 599 +87 3.28/5sec
MP 210 +62 2.81/5sec
AD 50.3 +2.8
Atk Speed 0.714 +0.016
Armor 21+2.1
MR 25+3.2
Speed 340

Passive: Mana Burn
Enemies hit with spells are marked with blue flames for 5 seconds.
Blue flames burn for 8/14/20/26 + 1/2/3/4% MAX MP magic damage per second.
Attacking mana burnt enemies with basic attacks regenerates 5/8/11/14% Missing MP and
removes the effect.

Q: Power Blast 80/90/100/110/120MP 17/16/15/14/13 seconds.
Passive: Casting Power blast causes Apidonos and the enemy hit to be effected by SPell Turbulance.
THe enemy hit and Apidonos releases an aura that reduces nearby enemy CDR by 2/4/6/8/10% for 3/6 seconds (Non champions or CHampions).
Active: Channels for .8/.7/.6/.5/.4 seconds. THen fires a arrow shaped form of energy towards the chosen location at an instant
speed. 450/550/650/750/850 range. The first enemy struck takes 110/150/200/260/330 +70%AP. Killing the enemy lays an magical sentry at the area.
Sentry lasts 15 seconds and effects an area of 275 range. Inside the stone, Apidonos spell cooldown is reduced by 1/2/3/4/5 seconds. 
and regenerates 6/8/11/15/20MP per second.

W: Spell Portal. 100 MP 33/31/29/27/25 seconds
Channels for 2.25 seconds and Summons a portal at a given location within 600/675/750/825/900 range.
Casting a spell causes the portal to also cast the same spell towards the chosen location.
Allies can walk into the portal to teleport to Apidonos. 

Lasts 15 seconds.

E: Electric Fluctuation 85/95/105/115/125MP 24/23.5/23/22.5/22 seconds.
Fires out a chain of lightning that bounces up to 4/5/6/7/8 times. Dealing 15/30/45/60/75 +30%AP + 2/3/4/5/6% MAX HP magic damage to all units hit.
This can bounce between 2 targets and targets the closes enemies instead of un hit targets.
Range of each bounce is within 425 units.



R: The Arch Mage. 150MP 190/150/110 seconds
For 20 seconds, Apidonos gains 100/200/300% Bonus Mana Regen, 20/40/60 Magic Penetration,
10/20/30% BONUS CDR that can go over max and all abilities gain 150/300/450 bonus range.


THank you and please leave comments if there are any suggestions

replies.body:
This sounds like a fun idea! The only little thing I'm concerned about is that Q passive? Maybe instead, you could have the CDR loss only work in an aura around him? So he can still have champions to have increased cooldowns but not when he isn't around (AKA global pressure). Does seem like a cool champ to play though. Nice!
